name: tomba-mcp-server
description: MCP server for Tomba email finder and verification API
long_description: This MCP server integrates with the Tomba.io API to provide tools for finding and verifying email addresses, enriching contact information, and discovering phone numbers. It offers a variety of tools, resources, and prompts to help users leverage Tomba's capabilities for lead generation, email verification, and contact enrichment.

tools.name: domain_search
tools.description: Search for all email addresses associated with a domain

tools.name: email_finder
tools.description: Find a specific person's email address using their name and company domain

tools.name: email_verifier
tools.description: Verify if an email address is valid and deliverable

tools.name: email_enrichment
tools.description: Enrich an email address with additional information about the person

tools.name: author_finder
tools.description: Find the email address of an article's author from a URL

tools.name: linkedin_finder
tools.description: Find email address from a LinkedIn profile URL

tools.name: phone_finder
tools.description: Find phone numbers associated with an email, domain, or LinkedIn profile

tools.name: phone_validator
tools.description: Validate a phone number and get carrier information

prompts.name: find_contact
prompts.description: Find complete contact information for a person at a company
prompts.text: Find the contact information for {firstName} {lastName} who works at {company}.

prompts.name: verify_email_list
prompts.description: Verify a list of email addresses for deliverability
prompts.text: Verify the following email addresses for deliverability: {emails}.

prompts.name: research_company
prompts.description: Research a company's contact information and organizational structure
prompts.text: Research the contact information and organizational structure for {domain} in the {department} department.

prompts.name: enrich_lead
prompts.description: Enrich a lead with all available contact information
prompts.text: Enrich the lead with email {email} and LinkedIn profile {linkedin} with all available contact information.

prompts.name: find_journalists
prompts.description: Find contact information for journalists who wrote specific articles
prompts.text: Find the contact information for journalists who wrote the following articles: {urls}.

prompts.name: finder_phone
prompts.description: Find phone numbers for a contact
prompts.text: Find phone numbers for the contact with email {email}, LinkedIn profile {linkedin}, or domain {domain}.

prompts.name: validate_phone
prompts.text: Validate the phone number {phone} and provide carrier information.
